comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Prussian-born Nernst (1864-1941) won the Nobel Prize in Chemistry (1920): nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/chemistry/laureates/1920/nern... Here he is as an older man: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/smithsonian/2551852054/] Given the later portrait, it seems unlikely this image was made in 1941.

comment.author: 7576993@N07
comment._content: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our photo! Since these photos were acquired from various print dealers by our donor, Bern Dibner, in the 1940’s, our records for the collection are a bit sparse. Your comments have been extremely valuable in helping us update information for this image.  Since the exact date of this image is still unknown, we've changed the date to read "Prior to 1941".
